protocol.name: P-GSE34047-2
protocol.text: Treated with 1 mM SA for 6 hrs (spray) or 10 µM elf18 for 2 hrs (infiltration into leaves). Mock treatments with water were included for both spray and infiltration.

protocol.name: P-GSE34047-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis plants (Columbia-0 and tbf1 mutant) were grown on soil (Metro Mix 360) at 22˚C under a 16/8 hr light/dark cycle for 3 weeks

protocol.name: P-GSE34047-4
protocol.text: The RNA was extracted with TRIzol (Ambion)

protocol.name: P-GSE34047-5
protocol.text: RNA probes were labelled using MessageAmp Premier RNA Amplification Kit (Ambion)

protocol.name: P-GSE34047-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized on Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip (Santa Clara, CA, U.S.A) for 16 hours at 45C with rotation at 60rpm.

protocol.name: P-GSE34047-7
protocol.text: Immediately following hybridization, the hybridized probe arrays undergo an automated washing and staining protocol on the GeneChip® FS450 fluidic station and are then scanned on the GeneChip® Scanner 3000 7G Plus where patterns of hybridization are detected.

protocol.name: P-GSE34047-8
protocol.text: The data were normalized with RMA algorithm using Gene-Spring GX default analysis settings
